title: RoyalCraft Wet & Dry Professional Ceramic Hair Straightener Flat Iron Ceramic Tourmaline Plates Immediate Heat Up Iron (Silver)
features: Wet and Dry Ceramic Tourmaline plates enable smooth pulling motion without breaking or damage to hair
Variable heat settings for all hair types. 5 (five) different power settings for your convenience - LED Temperature Display Lights.
Immediate heat up (450 Fahrenheit) with even heat distribution. Emits negative ions-leaves hair smooth, silky, frizz-free and healthy.
Lock to help you store away your Hair Straightener/ flat Iron with ease - Lock holds the Straighter/Iron in the closed position.
description: Its standard size 1 inch wide RoyalCraft wet and dry hair straightener. 1 Inch Wide Enable Smooth Pulling Motion without Breaking or Damage to Hair. 360 Degree Professional Swivel Cord. LED Lights indicate when unit is On/Power Settings. 5 (five) different power settings for your convenience - LED Temperature Display Lights. Instant Heat-Up up to 450 F (Degrees Fahrenheit) with Even Heat Distribution. Use on Wet or Dry Hair - Vents located on the side of the plates to help vent steam. Emits Negative Ions-Leaves hair Smooth, Silky, Frizz-free and Healthy. Ceramic Tourmaline Plates enable Smooth pulling motion without breaking or damaging to hair. Lock to help you store away your Hair Straighter/ flat Iron with ease - Lock holds the Straighter/Iron in the closed position.
